title: Cell emergence v1.1-FAS
description:
Cell: emergence v1.1 (c) New Life Interactive
Date: 2013-08-10 43 x 05.00: Files
Language: Multi 8 -: Protection

Ripped:
Nothing

Requirements:
Windows Installer 3.1
Microsoft .NET Framework 4
Microsoft XNA Framework Redistributable 4.0

Against the "smart germs" of tomorrow's biowarfare, nanites will be our
drone soldiers, but for how long? Enter the fluid living world of Cell
(grown from "dynamic voxels":wink: to live through the emergence of new life:
YOU, a nanobot who shoots deadly colloids and monofilament clouds, builds
defenses, pathways, and supercharged weapons, deciphers sinister enemy
nanotech, and LEARNS. Tactics, strategy, then awareness drive you to save
your patient, your host... your new home?

Version 1.1 serves new and casual players by adding visual tutorial screens
that demystify the "massively reactive" game mechanics

The "dynamic voxel" gameworld places high demands on players' ability to
perceive and interpret. In this new version of the game, players still face
challenging levels and surprising organic reactions within the
1,000,000-cell gameworld, but they now can focus on finding a cure for the
heroine's disease rather than deciphering the entire field of nanomedicine

The new tutorial screens present the terminology needed to understand the
biological simulation, and they explain the HUD, which implicitly defines
the goals of a mission

URL: http://www.newlifeinteractive.com/games/cell
NOTE: This game is English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Japansese
Korean and Chinese. Language is detected automaticly and can not be
changed

Unzip and unrar
Run 'setup.bat' to extract game data
Run 'setup.exe' to install game
Install required redistributables
Play
